mapper.insert: insert into cuser (UserID, RoleID, CompanyID, CompanyName, UserName, `Password`, ChineseName, EnglishName, Tel, EMall, CreateTime, UpdateTime, `Status`) values (#{userID,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{roleID,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{companyID,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{companyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{chineseName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{englishName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{EMall,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT})
mapper.update: update cuser set RoleID = #{roleID,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CompanyID = #{companyID,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CompanyName = #{companyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UserName = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `Password` = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ChineseName = #{chineseName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EnglishName = #{englishName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Tel = #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EMall = #{EMall,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CreateTime = #{createTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, UpdateTime = #{updateTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, `Status` = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT} where UserID = #{userID,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select UserID, RoleID, CompanyID, CompanyName, UserName, `Password`, ChineseName, EnglishName, Tel, EMall, CreateTime, UpdateTime, `Status` from cuser where UserID = #{userID,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select UserID, RoleID, CompanyID, CompanyName, UserName, `Password`, ChineseName, EnglishName, Tel, EMall, CreateTime, UpdateTime, `Status` from cuser
